about_the_game:
DOGS
SEARCH and RESCUE DLC

This DLC adds SAR Dogs to the game.
The best human`s friends will cooperate with You to save more Tourists!
All breeds have Special Skills and characteristics.
You can choose from 10 races:
❅ White Swiss Shepherd
❅ German Shepherd
❅ Black Shepherd
❅ Belgian Shepherd
❅ Golden Retriver
❅ Polish Tatra Shepherd
❅ Border Collie
❅ St. Bernard
❅ Siberian Husky
❅ Japanese Akita Inu
Pick your favorite dog and start the best Search and Rescue adventures together!
Enjoy and see You on trails!

Make sure to check other DLCs:
❅ Yosemite
❅ Mount Rainier

Rainiers National Park DLC will be available soon!
detailed_description:
DOGS
SEARCH and RESCUE DLC

This DLC adds SAR Dogs to the game.
The best human`s friends will cooperate with You to save more Tourists!
All breeds have Special Skills and characteristics.
You can choose from 10 races:
❅ White Swiss Shepherd
❅ German Shepherd
❅ Black Shepherd
❅ Belgian Shepherd
❅ Golden Retriver
❅ Polish Tatra Shepherd
❅ Border Collie
❅ St. Bernard
❅ Siberian Husky
❅ Japanese Akita Inu
Pick your favorite dog and start the best Search and Rescue adventures together!
Enjoy and see You on trails!

Make sure to check other DLCs:
❅ Yosemite
❅ Mount Rainier

Rainiers National Park DLC will be available soon!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: Intel® Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan capable
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan capable
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.13
  • Processor: 1.5Ghz or better (64 bit)
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal
  • Storage: 2048 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Mac compatible
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 10.13 or newer
  • Processor: 2Ghz or better (64 bit)
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal
  • Storage: 4096 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Mac compatible

name: SEARCH AND RESCUE | DOGS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® i5
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 capable
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® i7
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 capable
  • DirectX: Version 11

supported_languages:
English, Polish, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Norwegian, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Turkish, Slovak, Arabic, Bulgarian, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Romanian, Simplified Chinese, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Ukrainian, Vietnamese*, Croatian, Estonian, Latvian, Lithuanian, Maori, Slovenian
*languages with full audio support
